results.name: Continued fraction for sqrt(21).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1).
formula: a(n) = gcd(Fibonacci(n), Fibonacci(n-6)), n > 0. - _Gary Detlefs_, Dec 29 2010
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 14000); x=contfrac(sqrt(21)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b010125.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 03 2009
xref: Cf. A010477 (Decimal expansion). - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 03 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
